title: Spring in Central Park: My Favorite Meditation Spots
excerpt: Discovering moments of peace in Manhattan's urban oasis and how these quiet retreats help me maintain balance in the city's constant bustle.
content:
In a city that never sleeps, finding moments of stillness becomes essential. Despite the reputation for constant motion, New York offers remarkable pockets of tranquility if you know where to look.

Central Park, that magnificent green heart of Manhattan, has become my sanctuary. Each morning before work, I've been exploring different corners, discovering secret spots where the city's soundtrack fades just enough to hear my own thoughts again.
